title: High Dependency on Remittances
description: In 2022, personal remittances accounted for 41.94% of Tonga's GDP, indicating a significant reliance on funds sent from abroad.

title: Low External Debt Levels
description: As of 2023, Tonga's total external debt stood at $196.45 million, one of the lowest globally, reflecting prudent fiscal management.

title: Minimal Long-term Debt
description: In 2023, Tonga's long-term external debt was $151.36 million, showcasing a low long-term financial obligation.

title: Low Public Debt
description: Public and publicly guaranteed debt in Tonga was $151.36 million in 2023, indicating a controlled public debt scenario.

title: Low Present Value of Debt
description: The present value of Tonga's external debt was $159.28 million in 2023, reflecting a manageable debt burden.

title: Low IMF Repayments
description: Tonga's IMF repurchases and charges were $1.01 million in 2023, indicating minimal financial obligations to the IMF.

title: High Taxation on Goods and Services
description: In 2023, taxes on goods and services constituted 25.56% of the value added in industry and services, indicating a significant tax burden.

title: Low Trademark Activity
description: In 2021, only 3 trademark applications were filed by residents, suggesting limited innovation and brand development.

title: Decline in Household Consumption
description: Household consumption expenditure shrank by 20.98% in 2022, indicating economic challenges affecting consumer spending.

title: Decrease in Per Capita Consumption
description: Per capita household consumption fell by 20.64% in 2022, reflecting a significant decline in individual spending power.

title: Low Particulate Emission Damage
description: In 2021, Tonga incurred $1.56 million in particulate emission damage, indicating relatively low environmental costs.

title: Moderate Female Employment as Employers
description: In 2023, 17.45% of employed females in Tonga were employers, reflecting moderate female entrepreneurial activity.

title: Small Male Population in Early Thirties
description: In 2023, males aged 30-34 made up 4.54% of the male population, indicating a smaller demographic in this age group.
